New-York Historical Society
Solomon Sherwood Kimball correspondence AHMC - Sherwood, Solomon Kimball
5 letters (in 1 folder).
1821-1846 Five letters between Solomon Sherwood Kimball (1806–1890), his parents, Nathan Kimball (1767–1849) and Rachel (Sherwood) Kimball (1772–1852), and his sister, Amanda L. (Kimball) Topping (1811–1872). To request this collection for research, and for fuller details about it, please read its catalog record at bobcat.library.nyu.edu/nyhistory, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
